item.title: The dolphin-human cooperative fishing in Laguna, southern Brazil, under an Ecosystem Services approach
item.description: Honour’s thesis research project (2015) I was supervised by Dr. Nivaldo Peroni and co-supervised by Dr. Fábio Gonçalves Daura-Jorge and MSc. Dannielli Firme Herbst. Abstract
